byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Private equity owners of Petco, including TPG Capital and Leonard Green & Partners, file for initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: Going public will give its private equity owners, including TPG Capital and Leonard Green, an avenue to sell nearly a decade after buying the company.
snippet: Going public will give its private equity owners, including TPG Capital and Leonard Green, an avenue to sell nearly a decade after buying the company.
